Reviews.Title: Was Good Unitl....
Reviews.Author: MC
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone in December 2012, and received it 3 days later. That was great! Phone worked great until recently when my battery was at 30% and I was on the way to put it on the charger and noticed the phone had already turned off. I charged it over night, and still nothing. I then tried to reset it and switched batteries.  I also tried another charger, still NOTHING.  Hopefully I can get a replacement. Until I figure out what the problem is I don't know if I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Favorite Phone
Reviews.Author: IEvans
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone directly from T-Mobile in late 2011. I this phone worked great until about 3 months ago. I'm not sure what happened but the "touch" part of the phone wasn't working. I had a live background that moved so I know it wasn't the screen but representatives assured me it was a 1 in 1 million chance of that happening, but overall a great phone, in fact I'm ordering a new one as a replacement. It ran on Android which meant it had many apps, I would drop this phone all the time and it was very forgiving because it barely had a scratch. Screen NEVER cracked like so many smartphones today. Great camera, flashlight, full keyboard for texting and still a touch screen. Would definitely recommend to anyone, it's the best of all worlds.
